script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: What the hell is happening down here!?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Hang on! Sensors are going crazy.
Fuck! Villain Corp. are firing on the base, and the pumps are offline.
You need to get out of there before the entire facility floods!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Hang on, I'm going back for Horizon!

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: There's no time!

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Fang! What the hell are you doing!
We're out of time, we need all hands topside for the defensive!

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: It's hopeless. We could have stopped them, if this ginger bitch hadn't felt the need to meddle.
I'm going to make damn sure she doesn't get away with it before we all die.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Dammit, Fang! This is no time for your cowboy antics!
Get your ass to the surface NOW and join up with Interceptor Wing!
That's an ord...
*click*

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: Much better.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Uh... Penny?
Pardon my french, but what the fuck is happening?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: I have no clue, all of my sensors are still down. We're flying blind here.
I'm doing my best, just hang on!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Easier said than... hurk... done!
They're all over in here!

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: Where are you, my little red-haired RAT?
Come out and taste your punishment!

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: My, my, my. Look what the cat dragged in.
You have no idea what you've done with your little crusade.
We're helpless against them now, thanks to your meddling little hero act.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Them?

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: Hah! Ignorant AND troublesome. What a pathetic combination.
We were going to save your useless hides, but you just had to interfere, you little wretch.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: You're not making any sense, but then I'd expect nothing less from delusional Villain Corp. morons.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: kzzzkkkkkz... kkzzzkkkkzz.. urst, come in!
You have to... kkzkkzz... there... kzkzkzkz... surface.
Urgent code... kzkzkzzkz... not... kzzkzz... believe this!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Penny? I can't hear you, you're breaking up again.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: kzzkkzkz... thank... too late... kzzkzkz... warn...
*click*

script.speaker: FangDialogue
script.name: Scarlet Fang
lines: Just you and me now, little mouse.
I'll have your head if it's the last thing I do!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Penny? Come in, Penny?
Villain Corp. agent is down, but things haven't calmed down out here.
Where the hell are you? Answer, dammit!
